snippet.title: Little Keepers - Trailer | Demo available on Steam
snippet.description:
Little Keepers is an indie chaotic couch coop tower defense that will put your friendship to test! 🎮

As the Little Keepers (Dahlia🎀 and Ollie🧣) you’ll be given the chance to gather resources 🚜 and create the best strategy to defend your home 🏡 from spooky (but cute✨) creatures! 🍄

Demo available now on Steam! Stay tuned on our social media!

IG: @ littlekeepersgame
TW: @ Atabeycreations
LinkedIn: @ Atabey Creations
